featured.text: Located at the heart of Paris, this medieval cathedral is 21 for its intricate architecture, stunning stained glass windows, and, above all, its bells.
The heaviest drinkers in medieval Europe were actually Germans.

In medieval Europe, on the other hand, travel documents were issued by local authorities, and generally contained a list of towns and cities which the document holder was permitted to enter or pass through.
Later, in the medieval Islamic Caliphate, a form of passport was the bara’a, a receipt for taxes paid.
26 some six hundred years of architecture nearly untouched by natural disaster or war, the city retains much of its medieval appearance.

definition.zh_def: 中世紀的，指公元500年至1500年間的歐洲歷史時期。
definition.en_def: Relating to the Middle Ages, a period in European history from around the 5th to the late 15th century.
definition.example: The medieval castle stood proudly on the hill, a reminder of a bygone era.
